page.title: 10OIL DELIVERY FROM TIMSBURY
page.content:
We visited an oil delivery business that is very close to our school.We asked thirteen questions.Each of their four lorries have six wheels.Ten men and two ladies work there altogether. The average amount of oil delivered in a day is about twenty-five thousand litres.Their oil is delivered to them four times each day.Tankers containing twenty five thousand litres of oil come from Avonmouth Docks to deliver it to them.None of the drivers listened to 'C.B.'Radio. This family business began as a coal delivery business until all the local mines closed down.
{ By Steven,Mark and Robert.
